products.name: Almond Kernal
products.description: Almond kernels are a rich source of proteins, fibers, calcium and zinc. They are packed with antioxidants and are enjoyed as a smart snack or an impressive ingredient.
benefits: Almond kernels supports healthy brain function and are considered as brain best food.
Their daily consumption helps maintain dental and bone health
Almond kernels being great source of vitamin E and other antioxidants help nourish the skin and reduce sign of aging.
Almond kernels help control blood sugar levels and prevent diabetes
products.about: Almond kernels are used in sweets and desserts worldwide. They are used to extract almond oil which has diverse benefits. 10-12 pieces of Almond kernels must be consumed on a daily basis. Soaking them in water and then consuming makes them easy to digest and provides numerable health benefits.
storageCondition: They should be stored in a cool and a dry place.
They should be shifted to tupperware and not kept in plastic for long duration.
Refrigeration is ideal as it enhances the shelf life of Californian almond kernels.
products.shelfLife: Average shelf life of Almond kernels is 7-8 months, however refrigeration can make them last and stay fresh for even more than a year.

products.name: Cashew Nut
products.description: Cashew nuts are a popular snack. They are rich in healthy fats, protein, and various vitamins and minerals.
benefits: Cashew nuts support heart health.
They may help improve bone health.
Cashews are a good source of energy.
products.about: Cashew nuts are used in various culinary dishes and are enjoyed as a delicious and nutritious snack.
storageCondition: Store cashews in an airtight container.
Keep them in a cool, dry place.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of cashew nuts is around 6 months.

products.name: Pistachio
products.description: Pistachios are nuts that offer numerous health benefits. They are a rich source of protein, healthy fats, and antioxidants.
benefits: Pistachios may aid in weight management.
They promote heart health.
Pistachios are good for eye health.
products.about: Pistachios are commonly used in various desserts, salads, and dishes, adding a delightful crunch and flavor.
storageCondition: Store pistachios in a cool place.
Keep them in an airtight container.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of pistachios is around 9 months.

products.name: Walnut
products.description: Walnuts are nutrient-dense nuts with a rich array of health-promoting nutrients. They are high in omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamins.
benefits: Walnuts support heart health.
They may improve brain function.
Walnuts are beneficial for weight control.
products.about: Walnuts are often used in baking, salads, and as a nutritious snack. They have a distinct, rich flavor.
storageCondition: Keep walnuts in a cool, dark place.
Refrigeration can extend their shelf life.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of walnuts is around 6 months.

products.name: Green Raisins
products.description: Raisins are dried grapes, rich in natural sugars, fiber, and antioxidants. They are a convenient and healthy snack option.
benefits: Raisins are a good source of energy.
They may aid digestion.
Raisins contain iron and support blood health.
products.about: Raisins are used in cooking, baking, and as a topping for various dishes. They add natural sweetness and flavor.
storageCondition: Store raisins in a cool, dry place.
Keep them in an airtight container.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of raisins is around 12 months.

products.name: Dates
products.description: Dates are sweet fruits that come from the date palm tree. They are high in natural sugars, fiber, and various vitamins and minerals.
benefits: Dates are a good source of energy.
They contain essential minerals like potassium and magnesium.
Dates may support digestive health.
products.about: Dates are often consumed as a snack, added to desserts, or used in cooking. They have a sweet and caramel-like flavor.
storageCondition: Store dates in a cool place.
Keep them in a sealed container to prevent drying out.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dates is around 6 months.

products.name: Dried Mango
products.description: Dried mango is a delicious and nutritious snack. It retains the sweet and tangy flavor of fresh mangoes.
benefits: Dried mango is a good source of vitamins A and C.
It provides a quick energy boost.
Dried mango may aid digestion.
products.about: Dried mango can be enjoyed on its own or added to cereals, salads, and desserts for a burst of tropical flavor.
storageCondition: Store dried mango in a cool, dry place.
Keep it in an airtight container to maintain freshness.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried mango is around 6 months.

products.name: Dried Kiwi
products.description: Dried kiwi is a tasty and nutritious snack. It retains the natural sweetness and vibrant green color of fresh kiwi fruit.
benefits: Dried kiwi is rich in vitamin C and dietary fiber.
It may support digestive health.
Dried kiwi provides a convenient way to enjoy the flavor of kiwi year-round.
products.about: Dried kiwi can be eaten on its own or added to trail mixes, yogurt, or as a topping for desserts.
storageCondition: Store dried kiwi in a cool, dry place.
Keep it sealed in an airtight container to maintain its texture.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried kiwi is around 8 months.

products.name: Dried Pineapple
products.description: Dried pineapple is a sweet and tropical snack. It captures the juicy and tangy flavor of fresh pineapple.
benefits: Dried pineapple is a good source of vitamins and minerals.
It provides a natural energy boost.
Dried pineapple is a convenient and delicious on-the-go snack.
products.about: Dried pineapple can be enjoyed as a standalone snack or added to cereals, salads, and desserts for a burst of tropical sweetness.
storageCondition: Store dried pineapple in a cool, dry place.
Keep it in an airtight container to prevent moisture absorption.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried pineapple is around 9 months.

products.name: Dried Papaya
products.description: Dried papaya is a sweet and chewy snack. It preserves the tropical flavor of fresh papaya in a convenient form.
benefits: Dried papaya is rich in vitamins and minerals.
It provides natural sugars for a quick energy boost.
Dried papaya is a delicious and guilt-free treat.
products.about: Dried papaya can be enjoyed on its own, added to trail mixes, or used as a topping for yogurt and desserts.
storageCondition: Store dried papaya in a cool, dry place.
Keep it sealed in an airtight container to maintain its chewy texture.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried papaya is around 7 months.

products.name: Blueberries
products.description: Blueberries are small, sweet, and packed with antioxidants. Dried blueberries offer a convenient and flavorful snack option.
benefits: Blueberries are rich in antioxidants and vitamins.
They may support heart health.
Dried blueberries provide natural sweetness without added sugars.
products.about: Dried blueberries can be enjoyed on their own, added to cereals, or used in baking for a burst of flavor and color.
storageCondition: Store dried blueberries in a cool, dry place.
Keep them in an airtight container to prevent moisture absorption.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried blueberries is around 10 months.

products.name: Strawberries
products.description: Strawberries are sweet and juicy berries. Dried strawberries offer a convenient and flavorful snack option.
benefits: Strawberries are rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.
They may support immune health.
Dried strawberries provide a natural and healthy alternative to sugary snacks.
products.about: Dried strawberries can be enjoyed on their own, added to cereals, or used as a topping for yogurt and desserts.
storageCondition: Store dried strawberries in a cool, dry place.
Keep them in an airtight container to preserve their texture and flavor.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of dried strawberries is around 9 months.

products.name: Chia Seeds
products.description: Chia seeds are small, nutrient-dense seeds that are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, fiber, and antioxidants.
benefits: Chia seeds are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.
They provide a good amount of dietary fiber.
Chia seeds can be a versatile addition to a variety of dishes.
products.about: Chia seeds can be sprinkled on yogurt, added to smoothies, or used in baking for an extra nutritional boost.
storageCondition: Store chia seeds in a cool, dry place.
Keep them in a sealed container to prevent moisture absorption.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of chia seeds is around 12 months.

products.name: Flax Seeds
products.description: Flax seeds are tiny powerhouses of nutrition, known for their high content of omega-3 fatty acids, fiber, and antioxidants.
benefits: Flax seeds are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.
They provide a good amount of dietary fiber.
Flax seeds may support heart health and digestive function.
products.about: Flax seeds can be added to smoothies, sprinkled on salads, or used in baking for a nutty and nutritious boost.
storageCondition: Store flax seeds in a cool, dry place.
Keep them in an airtight container to prevent oxidation.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of flax seeds is around 10 months.

products.name: Fitness Mix
products.description: Fitness Mix is a wholesome and nutritious blend of rolled oats, nuts, seeds, and dried fruits. It makes for a hearty and satisfying breakfast.
benefits: Fitness Mix is a good source of fiber and complex carbohydrates.
It provides sustained energy throughout the day.
Fitness Mix can be customized with yogurt or milk for a delicious breakfast option.
products.about: Fitness Mix can be enjoyed with milk, yogurt, or as a topping for smoothie bowls for a nutritious start to the day.
storageCondition: Store Fitness Mix in a cool, dry place.
Keep it in an airtight container to maintain its freshness and crunchiness.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of Fitness Mix is around 6 months.

products.name: Seeds & berries
products.description: The Happilo Seeds & berries Pack is a curated selection of wholesome and delicious items to kickstart your day with nutrition and energy.
benefits: The Seeds & berries pack includes a variety of dried fruits, nuts, seeds, and museli.
It offers a convenient and nutritious option for busy mornings.
The pack is customizable based on your preferences and dietary needs.
products.about: The Happilo Seeds & berries Pack is designed to provide a balanced and satisfying start to your day. Enjoy it as is or customize your Seeds & berries bowl.
storageCondition: Store the Seeds & berries pack in a cool, dry place.
Keep it in an airtight container to preserve the freshness of individual items.
products.shelfLife: The average shelf life of the Happilo Seeds & berries Pack is around 8 months.
